languages.text: "И да и нет, Ваша Светлость. Может ли столь обширный и плодородный мир накормить несколько тысяч пустотных крыс? Конечно да, у нас вредители в хранилищах каждый цикл уничтожают больше провизии, чем эти люди способны съесть за всю свою жизнь. Но есть ли у нас возможность доставить им этот груз? Ни малейшей".

"Yes and no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If the question is: can such an expansive and fertile world as this one feed a few thousand void rats? Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."
languages.original_text: "И да и нет, Ваша Светлость. Может ли столь обширный и плодородный мир накормить несколько тысяч пустотных крыс? Конечно да, у нас вредители в хранилищах каждый цикл уничтожают больше провизии, чем эти люди способны съесть за всю свою жизнь. Но есть ли у нас возможность доставить им этот груз? Ни малейшей".

Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

languages.text: “既可以，也不可以，大人。如果换个问题，像加努斯这种广袤而肥沃的世界，能养活几千只虚空老鼠吗？当然可以。我们每个产粮周期，由于害虫的啃食所损失的食物，比落脚港那群人一辈子吃的东西都要多。但我们有办法把这些补给运送到落脚港吗？目前根本做不到。”
languages.original_text: "Yes and no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If the question is: can such an expansive and fertile world as this one feed a few thousand void rats? Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

traits.locale_text: “既可以，也不可以，大人。如果换个问题，像加努斯这种广袤而肥沃的世界，能养活几千只虚空老鼠吗？当然可以。我们每个产粮周期，由于害虫的啃食所损失的食物，比落脚港那群人一辈子吃的东西都要多。但我们有办法把这些补给运送到落脚港吗？目前根本做不到。”

languages.text: «Sí y no, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Si me pregunta si un mundo tan grande y fértil como este puede alimentar a varios miles de ratas del vacío, la respuesta es que sí: perdemos más comida a manos de alimañas cada ciclo de lo que la población entera de Paso comerá en toda sus vidas. Pero si me pregunta si podemos enviar las provisiones a Paso: en absoluto».
languages.original_text: "Yes and no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If the question is: can such an expansive and fertile world as this one feed a few thousand void rats? Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

traits.locale_text: «Sí y no, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Si me pregunta si un mundo tan grande y fértil como este puede alimentar a varios miles de ratas del vacío, la respuesta es que sí: perdemos más comida a manos de alimañas cada ciclo de lo que la población entera de Paso comerá en toda sus vidas. Pero si me pregunta si podemos enviar las provisiones a Paso: en absoluto».

languages.text: 「どちらとも言えません、陛下。ご質問の意図が、この惑星のように広大かつ肥沃な土地ならば腹を空かせた数千匹のネズミを養えるか、ということでしたら、もちろん可能です。私たちはフットフォールの人々が生涯で口にするより多くの食料を、数年周期でげっ歯類の害獣に取られていますから。しかし食料をフットフォールに出せるか、ということならばお断りします」
languages.original_text: "Yes and no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If the question is: can such an expansive and fertile world as this one feed a few thousand void rats? Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

traits.locale_text: 「どちらとも言えません、陛下。ご質問の意図が、この惑星のように広大かつ肥沃な土地ならば腹を空かせた数千匹のネズミを養えるか、ということでしたら、もちろん可能です。私たちはフットフォールの人々が生涯で口にするより多くの食料を、数年周期でげっ歯類の害獣に取られていますから。しかし食料をフットフォールに出せるか、ということならばお断りします」

languages.text: "Ja und nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Falls die Frage lautet, ob eine so weitläufige und fruchtbare Welt wie diese einige Tausend Leerenratten versorgen kann, dann ist die Antwort natürlich Ja – wir verlieren in jedem Zyklus mehr Vorräte an Ungeziefer, als alle auf Footfall in ihrem ganzen Leben essen könnten. Aber können wir diese Vorräte nach Footfall verschiffen? Keine Chance."
languages.original_text: "Yes and no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If the question is: can such an expansive and fertile world as this one feed a few thousand void rats? Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

traits.locale_text: "Ja und nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Falls die Frage lautet, ob eine so weitläufige und fruchtbare Welt wie diese einige Tausend Leerenratten versorgen kann, dann ist die Antwort natürlich Ja – wir verlieren in jedem Zyklus mehr Vorräte an Ungeziefer, als alle auf Footfall in ihrem ganzen Leben essen könnten. Aber können wir diese Vorräte nach Footfall verschiffen? Keine Chance."

languages.text: « Oui et non, Votre Seigneurie. Il va de soi qu'un monde aussi vaste et fertile que celui-ci est largement en mesure de nourrir quelques milliers de rats du néant. En fait, les nuisibles nous font perdre à chaque cycle plus de provisions que les habitants de Castel pourraient en consommer au cours de toute leur vie. Mais pouvons-nous expédier lesdites provisions à la station ? Pas dans la situation actuelle. »
languages.original_text: "Yes and no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If the question is: can such an expansive and fertile world as this one feed a few thousand void rats? Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

traits.locale_text: « Oui et non, Votre Seigneurie. Il va de soi qu'un monde aussi vaste et fertile que celui-ci est largement en mesure de nourrir quelques milliers de rats du néant. En fait, les nuisibles nous font perdre à chaque cycle plus de provisions que les habitants de Castel pourraient en consommer au cours de toute leur vie. Mais pouvons-nous expédier lesdites provisions à la station ? Pas dans la situation actuelle. »

languages.text: "Hem evet hem hayır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Böylesi engin ve bereketli bir dünya, birkaç bin uçsuz sıçanını besleyebilir mi diye soruyorsanız tabii ki besleyebilir. Binliman'dakilerin ömürleri boyunca tüketebileceğinden daha fazla erzakı burada bir döngüde haşerelere kaptırıyoruz. Lakin mevzubahis erzakları Binliman'a gönderebiliriz miyiz? İşte orası mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: "Yes and no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If the question is: can such an expansive and fertile world as this one feed a few thousand void rats? Of course it can — we lose more provisions to gnawing pests every cycle than those on Footfall could eat in their entire lives. But can we ship said provisions to Footfall? Not a chance."

traits.locale_text: "Hem evet hem hayır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Böylesi geniş ve bereketli bir dünya, birkaç bin uçsuz sıçanını besleyebilir mi, diye soruyorsanız tabii ki besleyebilir. Binliman'dakilerin tüm yaşamları boyunca tüketebileceğinden daha fazla erzakı burada bir döngüde haşereler yiyor. Lakin mevzubahis erzakları Binliman'a göndermek mümkün değil."
